actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

official_title: To amend titles XI and XIX of the Social Security Act to establish a comprehensive and nationwide system to evaluate the quality of care provided to beneficiaries of Medicaid and the Children's Health Insurance Program and to provide incentives for voluntary quality improvement.
short_title: Medicaid and CHIP Quality Improvement Act of 2016

titles.title: Medicaid and CHIP Quality Improvement Act of 2016

To amend titles XI and XIX of the Social Security Act to establish a comprehensive and nationwide system to evaluate the quality of care provided to beneficiaries of Medicaid and the Children's Health Insurance Program and to provide incentives for voluntary quality improvement.
